comment: if you really need to learn psychology, she is not the good choice. If you need an easy A,don't need to learn subject, go ahead.Pros:encourage you to study by conducting regular quiz. CONS: she may skips 2 or 3 chapter, but will include those in exam. You need to study by yourself. Boring lecture.

Dr.Walsh is so fun and full of life! I took her class as a hybrid. There are 3 test & a final, lots of quizzes, one easy  television assignment, and attendance grades. She also gives a lot of extra credit, so do not be afraid to answer questions in class! Test are extensive, but she gives you a study guide that really helps. Take her!
I love her! She's so cool and gives extra credit all the time. I would advise you to attend class. If you study you should pass the class with an A.
She is super sweet and very easy to talk to! Go to class because she gives extra credit for it an d read the book and you should be fine!

She's so cool and perky lol. I really liked her she got me interested in psychology. You must read and use the powerpoints but overall the tests are easy. She gives points for attendance and extra credit for answering reading questions. She gives great examples and videos. really easy to talk to.

Great teacher!!! She really does a good job explaining all the different concepts. As long as you read the chapter and pay attention you will get an A. She is also really nice and really cares about her students

Easy class if you pay attention. Take notes on the power points and read the assigned text for tests and you will do fine. Try to make every class, because she gives extra credit and a grade for attendance.
